title: 119 - Is Punxsutawney Phil A Fraud?
description: On today's show, the guys decide whether or not Punxsatawney Phil is a fraud and chat about his groundhog brethren Staten Island Steve and Dunkirk Dave, they build they ultimate sandwiches, Mitt has some breaking news about his living arrangements, the guys decide which US state they would eliminate if they were forced to, give a touching tribute to Dustin Diamond, Tone botches the names of some movies/actors, Zeet airs out some grievances about his movers who tried to swindle him out of some cash, and much much more as they dive through a loaded Pod FOD. As always, send you submissions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured in the Pod FOD. We appreciate the hell out of all of you for listening. We'll see you on Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
